h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location
content: Once defeated, the boss will drop the Golden Lining Transformation spell. For some key tips on how to defeat Yellow Loong, our page on the boss has a list of key tips and a breakdown of every move and how to counter it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Lining.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Lining', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location'.
The content is as follows:
Once defeated, the boss will drop the Golden Lining Transformation spell. For some key tips on how to defeat Yellow Loong, our page on the boss has a list of key tips and a breakdown of every move and how to counter it.
